name: SHRIVE
description:
This is made for ArtCenter GameJam 2022SP.

Made by FoxMiao and Ethan.

Music by DietSad.

Shrive your way through medical Europe advising poor wretches that seek God.

Not all questions have a "right" answer a fact that those who shrive are keenly aware of. 

There are many bugs, and the story is unfinished because only have two people and only have 48hour, but still,

hope you enjoy the game.

Thank you for playing the game.
